quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: The expert in anything was once a beginner.
author: Helen Hayes

quote: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
author: Norman Vaughan

quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: If you are not willing to learn, no one can help you. If you are determined to learn, no one can stop you.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Learning never exhausts the mind.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: The only way to learn mathematics is to do mathematics.
author: Paul Halmos

quote: Strive for progress, not perfection.
author: Unknown

quote: Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day in and day out.
author: Robert Collier

quote: Your limitation—it’s only your imagination.
author: Unknown

quote: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
author: Unknown

quote: Failure is the opportunity to begin again more intelligently.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
author: Sean Patrick Flanery

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Small progress is still progress.
author: Unknown

quote: Work hard in silence, let success make the noise.
author: Frank Ocean

quote: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: There are no shortcuts to any place worth going.
author: Beverly Sills

quote: The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.
author: Unknown

quote: Learning is a treasure that will follow its owner everywhere.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
author: Suzy Kassem

quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: The beautiful thing about learning is nobody can take it away from you.
author: B.B. King

quote: Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: You are capable of more than you know.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: Motivation gets you started. Habit keeps you going.
author: Jim Ryun

quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Success doesn’t come from what you do occasionally, it comes from what you do consistently.
author: Marie Forleo

quote: If you want to achieve greatness stop asking for permission.
author: Unknown

quote: Learning is not attained by chance, it must be sought for with ardor and attended to with diligence.
author: Abigail Adams

quote: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
author: Jimmy Johnson

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: Don’t limit your challenges. Challenge your limits.
author: Unknown

quote: Knowledge will bring you the opportunity to make a difference.
author: Claire Fagin

quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

quote: Be stronger than your excuses.
author: Unknown

quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
author: Unknown

quote: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after another.
author: Walter Elliot

quote: Success is built on discipline, not motivation.
author: Unknown

quote: What we learn with pleasure we never forget.
author: Alfred Mercier

quote: Great things are done by a series of small things brought together.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
author: Confucius

quote: You learn more from failure than from success.
author: Unknown

quote: Education is the passport to the future.
author: Malcolm X

quote: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
author: Tim Ferriss

quote: Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: Success is not about luck, it is about persistence.
author: Unknown

quote: Do the hard jobs first. The easy jobs will take care of themselves.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: Learning is a lifelong process.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Your education is a dress rehearsal for a life that is yours to lead.
author: Nora Ephron
